{{Quote|Ulf is demanding blood money, which Shagga and Gunthor refuse to pay.|Tyrion Lannister|Baelor}}
'''Gunthor''' is a member of the [[Stone Crows]], one of the [[hill tribes]] of the [[Mountains of the Moon]] recruited by [[Tyrion Lannister]] to fight for him in the initial stages of the [[War of the Five Kings]] in exchange for gold, weaponry and armor the hill tribes could employ against [[House Arryn]].
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, GunthorÂ son of Gurn, along with [[Shagga]] son of Dolf and other clansmen, meets Tyrion and [[Bronn]]Â in the Mountains of the Moon. In fact Gunthor is the first to introduce himself to Tyrion, by saying Shagga's TV-series line: "When you meet your gods, say it was Gunthor son of Gurn of the Stone Crows who sent you to them."Â Â Later, instead of departing withÂ TyrionÂ to the LannisterÂ camp, Gunthor stays behind at the Mountains to rally the members of the hill tribes.

Later whenÂ [[Sandor Clegane]]Â andÂ [[Arya Stark]]Â arrive in the [[Vale]], they are told that Hill Tribes are robbing and killing around, including the Stone Crows led by Gunthor.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Tyrion reports to [[Tywin Lannister|his father]] and [[Kevan Lannister|his uncle]] that [[Ulf]], of the [[Moon Brothers]], is demanding blood money from [[Shagga]], of the [[Stone Crows]]. Shagga, Gunthor, and a third Stone Crow had killed a Moon Brother after the latter stabbed a Stone Crow over a sausage.<ref>"[[Baelor]]"</ref>
